member.name: GRADIENT_TRIANGLE
member.summary: The GRADIENT_TRIANGLE structure specifies the index of three vertices in the pVertex array in the GradientFill function. These three vertices form one triangle.

member.name: GRADIENT_TRIANGLE.Vertex1
member.summary: The first point of the triangle where sides intersect.

member.name: GRADIENT_TRIANGLE.Vertex2
member.summary: The second point of the triangle where sides intersect.

member.name: GRADIENT_TRIANGLE.Vertex3
member.summary: The third point of the triangle where sides intersect.
